      • noMatch

        public void noMatch(Handler<WebSocketMatcher.Match> handler)
        Specify a handler that will be called when no other handlers match. If this handler is not specified default behaviour is to reject the websocket (i.e. return 404 to the websocket client in the handshake)
        Parameters:
        handler -
